price: 46. Kasi soki balingaka kobima (тропа kobunda), balingaki komilengele тропа yango. Kasi Allah asepelaki te na kobima na bango. Mpe avandisi bango. Mpe ayebisaki bango: Botikala elongo na baye batikalaki.
arabic: ۞ وَلَوۡ أَرَادُواْ ٱلۡخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّواْ لَهُۥ عُدَّةٗ وَلَٰكِن كَرِهَ ٱللَّهُ ٱنۢبِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِيلَ ٱقۡعُدُواْ مَعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaw arādū al-khurūja la-aʿaddū lahu ʿuddatan walākin kariha al-lahu inbiʿāthahum fathabbaṭahum waqīla uq'ʿudū maʿa al-qāʿidīna
translations: so He made them lag behind
